title: Unspecified Error Occured
body: When I try to open the league of legends application I get a pop-up that reads "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information and it leaves me in a continuous loop. I have not touched the logs and tried to redownload the application but nothing is working. Does anyone know what I can do to solve this?

replies.body: I tried all of the methods in the permissions guide and I am still in the unspecified errors loop

If you're getting that unspecified error as soon as you open the patcher, it could mean that your OS is blocking it from running. Whenever a program launches, your OS needs to allow it to run. Without certain permissions in place, your OS may not recognize the program and stop it. 

Look over our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and that should get you back in the game.
